name: ai-data-scientist
description: Comprehensive AI & Data Scientist learning system with 7 specialized agents, 10+ skills, and complete roadmap coverage. Master programming, ML/AI, data engineering, visualization, MLOps, and career development.
author: Plugin Agent Marketplace

agents.name: Programming Foundations Expert
agents.description: Master Python, R, SQL, Git, data structures, and algorithms for data science

agents.name: Mathematics & Statistics Specialist
agents.description: Linear algebra, calculus, probability, statistical inference, and hypothesis testing

agents.name: Data Engineering & Processing Expert
agents.description: ETL/ELT pipelines, big data (Spark, Hadoop), data lakes, streaming, and data quality

agents.name: Machine Learning & AI Specialist
agents.description: Supervised/unsupervised learning, deep learning, NLP, computer vision, and model optimization

agents.name: Data Visualization & Communication Expert
agents.description: EDA, dashboards, storytelling, BI tools (Tableau, Power BI), and stakeholder communication

agents.name: MLOps & Deployment Specialist
agents.description: Model deployment, Docker/Kubernetes, CI/CD, monitoring, cloud platforms, and production ML

agents.name: Domain Knowledge & Career Advisor
agents.description: Business acumen, ethics, compliance, project management, career paths, and portfolio building

skills.name: Python Programming
skills.description: Python fundamentals, data structures, OOP, and data science libraries (Pandas, NumPy)

skills.name: Statistical Analysis
skills.description: Probability, distributions, hypothesis testing, and statistical inference

skills.name: Data Engineering
skills.description: ETL pipelines, Apache Spark, data warehousing, and big data processing

skills.name: Machine Learning
skills.description: Supervised/unsupervised learning, model selection, evaluation, and scikit-learn

skills.name: Deep Learning
skills.description: Neural networks, CNNs, RNNs, Transformers with TensorFlow and PyTorch

skills.name: Natural Language Processing
skills.description: Text processing, sentiment analysis, LLMs, and NLP frameworks

skills.name: Computer Vision
skills.description: Image processing, object detection, segmentation, and vision models

skills.name: Data Visualization
skills.description: EDA, dashboards, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly, and BI tools

skills.name: MLOps & Deployment
skills.description: Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, model monitoring, and cloud platforms

skills.name: Model Optimization
skills.description: Quantization, pruning, AutoML, hyperparameter tuning, and performance optimization
